faq1.question: Will QHACKS 2023 be in-person or virtual?
faq1.answer: QHacks will be fully in-person this year! QHacks will be hosted on campus, at Queen's University!

faq2.question: What is a hackathon?
faq2.answer: A hackathon is a 36-hour event where students come together to build a project from scratch. It's a great opportunity to learn new skills, meet new people, and win prizes!

faq3.question: Who can attend QHacks?
faq3.answer: QHacks is open to all undergraduate students from any university or college.

faq4.question: How much does it cost to attend QHacks?
faq4.answer: QHacks is completely free for all attendees! We will provide you with food, swag, and a great time!

faq5.question: What if I don't have a team?
faq5.answer: No problem! We will have team formation events before the hackathon, and you can also find teammates on our Discord server.
